body_html:
the tests that mention tolerance are failing because the test tolerance bounds are too tight.
They may need the bounds to be loosened a little and they will pass.

py-cpuinfo exactly as @asimshankar described.

The above is as much information as I can provide on the failures based on very little information you have on the spreadsheet. If you read the full logs, you should be able to adjust the bounds as needed based on the numbers there.

body:
the tests that mention tolerance are failing because the test tolerance bounds are too tight.
They may need the bounds to be loosened a little and they will pass.

py-cpuinfo exactly as @asimshankar described.

The above is as much information as I can provide on the failures based on very little information you have on the spreadsheet. If you read the full logs, you should be able to adjust the bounds as needed based on the numbers there.
